name: Private Urban Oasis w/ Backyard / 15 min to NYC
description:
Welcome to my home!

Just 15 steps away from the one bedroom apartment and you get the bus that takes around 15 minutes to Time Square!!! Newark Int'l Airport is a 20 minute drive away. A 5 minute walk away is the Lightrail to get around Jersey City. There is street parking but you should get a daily permit for M-F and be mindful of street signs.

The semi-basement apartment has a keyless entry so I am flexible and can make accommodations re. check in, check out, leaving bags, etc. Just ask :)

The space
The private one bedroom apartment (approximately 600 square feet total and located on the semi-basement floor) gives you the warm feeling of a home away from home while on vacation. The backyard is great to relax or have a bbq. The apartment is completely private and you have exclusive use of the entire bottom floor and a private part of the backyard. As for added bonuses, I provide a Keurig machine and blackout curtains throughout the apartm
neighborhood_description: My area of Jersey City is very vibrant, eclectic and diverse, with nice cafes and restaurants and it is safe. In the apartment is a brochure which provides information for local spots. Some of my favorite local spots are within a couple of blocks of the apartment. Corto restaurant is a favorite and has a farm to table menu, outdoor seating in the backyard and it is BYOB. Fox and Crow is a nice burger spot that has a parlor in the backroom where you can enjoy live music on Friday and Saturday nights. Milk Sugar Love is an organic ice cream shop. Also, Riverview Park, just one block away, provides great views of Manhattan, especially at night.

This beautiful 2 bedroom apartment is a few blocks away from the bus and train into Manhattan where you will be in the heart of Times Square in 20 minutes. The location couldn't be better with numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and various other stores within a walk-able distance. The night life in Hoboken on the weekends is a must. This apartment sleeps 5 people comfortably.

The space
The apartment is over 1000 Square Feet! The apartment is kept very clean and the carpet in both bedrooms is brand new. Linens are brand new. Guest access
Entire Apartment
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken is a square mile city across the Hudson river from New York City. Hoboken is rich in night life as is boasts the most bars per square mile anywhere in the United States. Guests may take a bus or a train to Manhattan in 20 minutes. The town is extremely safe and there are tons of great places to view the Manhattan Skyline.

Some of our favorite local places to eat in Hoboken & the Heights:
M&P Biancomano's: 11th and Washington Street
Benny Tudino's - Home of the largest slice: 6th and Washington Street
Renato's Pizza Master: Hutton and Central Ave
Otto Strada: 8th and Park Ave
La Isla: 1st and Washington Street
Amanda's: 9th and Washington Street

description:
Stay in style in the Hoboken neighborhood where Frank Sinatra grew up and made his singing debut at a church supper! This sunny 1,300-square-foot (120 square meters) space has an upscale kitchen and a private outdoor space to relax/bbq during the warmer months. Step out to a friendly neighborhood, close to restaurants, shops and Light Rail service to PATH trains that will have you in NY in minutes. Harmony’s guest services manager will greet you at the door and be on call throughout your stay.

The space
The walk up

Set on a quiet neighborhood street, this brand-new 5-story walk up is furnished to a high standard, with hardwood floors and cabinetry, marble bathrooms and high-profile windows overlooking Hoboken.

The apartment

If you’d rather not be right in heart of Hoboken’s busy downtown thoroughfare, this apartment is a terrific option—less congested, yet just as convenient to restaurants, shops and local transportation, with ple
neighborhood_description:
Just one-square-mile (2.5 square kilometers) in size, Hoboken is a small town with everything you love about city life. Washington Street is the main thoroughfare, lined with great restaurants, bars bistro-pubs and rooftop bars. name: 🌾Spacious 2Bed/2Bath in Heart of Hoboken
description:
This beautiful 2 bedroom apartment is a few blocks away from the bus and train into Manhattan where you will be in the heart of Times Square in 20 minutes. The location couldn't be better with numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and various other stores within a walk-able distance. The night life in Hoboken on the weekends is a must. This apartment sleeps 5 people comfortably.

The space
The apartment is over 1000 Square Feet! The apartment is kept very clean and the carpet in both bedrooms is brand new. The kitchen is stocked with pots and pans, cups, plates, and a working refrigerator, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. The apartment has hardwood floors and a tiled bathroom.

The space is great for work from home or those taking summer classes! Each bedroom is equipped with 2 desks and the apartment has speedy 1 Gig wifi. The open kitchen and living space is perfect for guests who love to cook and hang out together!

Guest access
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken is a square mile city across the Hudson river from New York City. Hoboken is rich in night life as is boasts the most bars per square mile anywhere in the United States. Guests may take a bus or a train to Manhattan in 20 minutes. The town is extremely safe and there are tons of great places to view the Manhattan Skyline.

Some of our favorite local places to eat in Hoboken & the Heights:
M&P Biancomano's: 11th and Washington Street
Benny Tudino's - Home of the largest slice: 6th and Washington Street
Renato's Pizza Master: Hutton and Central Ave
Otto Strada: 8th and Park Ave
La Isla: 1st and Washington Street
Amanda's: 9th and Washington Street

description:

●Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
●Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.

We are on a quiet street, and blocks away from the Journal Square PATH train station which takes you right into the city in 10 minutes. WiFi is included!

The space
If you are looking to enjoy NYC, the Journal Square PATH train is located a mile away. from here you can be in Manhattan in 10 minutes. Take a nice walk to the train station, ride the bus from the corner, or Uber there in 5 minutes.

Jersey City also has a lot to offer. The Grove Street neighborhood is full of bars and amazing restaurants, and also just a 5 minute Uber down the street.

We are across the street from Lincoln Park, which is full of walking trails, beautiful lawns, ponds, fountains, and basketball & tennis courts.

We are a quick and easy 10 minute Uber to Newar

name: Large Stylish 3BR Loft on Cobblestone Ln. near NYC
description:
Duck into this walkup on a cobblestone lane just around the corner from Hoboken’s hip main street and unlock an ultra-modern retreat with 1,450 sq. ft. (134 sqm) of space - perfect for families, friends and business travelers. You'll be steps from PATH trains and ferries that will have you in NYC in 15 minutes and great restaurants, bars and shopping in downtown Hoboken. The best of both worlds! Harmony Apartments guest services manager will greet you and be on call to make your stay memorable.

The space
The Renovated Downtown Walk-up

Location, location, location! Just across the Hudson River from Manhattan in charming Hoboken, NJ, this historic brick building is tucked away on a cobblestone lane, steps from dining, shopping and nightlife downtown.

There's some interesting history here! This lane originally provided access to the residents' mews, or stables. It was also a film location in the Marlon Brando movie, "On the Waterfront" in 1
neighborhood_description:
Just one-square-mile (2.5 square kilometers) in size, Hoboken is a small town with everything you love about city life. Washington Street is the main thoroughfare, lined with great restaurants, bars bistro-pubs and rooftop bars. Spend an afternoon exploring quaint cobblestone streets, where you’ll find one-of-a-kind boutiques.

Take in the stunning views of NYC as you bike or stroll along the Hudson River Waterfront Walkway, visiting parks and piers on with way. Join the free yoga class at Pier A or settle in for a movie under the stars at Pier 13 Park. Throughout the year, Hoboken hosts a wide range of concerts and a full schedule of festivals celebrating the arts and food—from Restaurant Week to The Mutz (Mozzarella) Festival. There’s a youthful energy here that’s infectious.

neighborhood_description:
The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. If you want more shopping, next to the Newport Mall, you can find Shoprite, BJ’S Wholesale, Bed Bath & Beyond, The Home Depot and Target.

description:
From the moment you see the waterfront from the roof, you’ll know you made the right choice. Your Sonder comes with its own kitchenette, dining nook, and en-suite laundry. There’s also a (seasonal) rooftop pool to go along with that waterfront view we mentioned, a fitness center, a golf simulator, and a co-working space. neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

name: Sonder Battery Park | One-Bedroom Apartment w/ Peloton
description:
From the moment you see the waterfront from the roof, you’ll know you made the right choice. Your Sonder comes with its own kitchenette, a dining nook, en-suite laundry, and a Peloton. There’s also a (seasonal) rooftop pool to go along with that waterfront view we mentioned, a fitness center, a golf simulator, and a co-working space. You’ll be right across from The Battery — a waterfront oasis with 195,000 square feet of perennial gardens. The New York Stock Exchange, Wall Street, and One World Trade Center are also a quick walk away.

The space
Working, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Peloton bike, compatible with standard athletic sneakers only
- En-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast and HDMI cord
neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

Available only during certain dates when the owner is away.

So clean you can lick off of the floors.

Brick loft style with unique trim and HUGE ceilings. Spacious

Access to all amenities includes all three gyms, offices, grills, fireplaces, etc.

Internet is 350Mbs/350Mbs. There's a desk for an easy work configuration.

name: Sonder Battery Park | Superior Studio Apartment
description:
From the moment you see the waterfront from the roof, you’ll know you made the right choice. Your Sonder comes with its own kitchenette, dining nook, and en-suite laundry. There’s also a (seasonal) rooftop pool to go along with that waterfront view we mentioned, a fitness center, a golf simulator, and a co-working space. You’ll be right across from The Battery — a waterfront oasis with 195,000 square feet of perennial gardens. The New York Stock Exchange, Wall Street, and One World Trade Center are also a quick walk away.

The space
Working, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- En-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming
- Daily garage parking nearby
- Co-working space
-
neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

name: Private 1BR in heart of downtown Jersey City
description:
Large one bedroom with king bed. Close to PATH train with 24hr access to Manhattan. Small garden with private deck. Walking distance to supermarket, restaurants and coffee shops. High speed internet. Fully equipped galley kitchen. Free street parking on holidays and weekends.

The space
King size bed in bedroom sleeps two.
Couch in Living room converts to a day bed, sleeps one.
Comes with clean linens, towels, shampoo, liquid soaps, and everything else you'll need for a comfortable stay.
Mesh Wifi network with very fast speeds (Gigabit internet with effective 200Mbps to 400Mbps over wifi) and complete coverage over the entire property. Has several laptop friendly work spaces.
55 inch 4K Smart LED TV with Netflix, HBO Max and Amazon Prime videos and Roku Channel (100 live channels).
Recessed lighting with dimmers throughout apartment.
Hairdryer, iron, ironing board, hangers are provided.
Comes with Keurig coffee maker with refill
neighborhood_description: The Grove Street area location of the apartment makes it extremely close to Manhattan via the PATH train. Ferries, a light rail (HBLR) and buses also provide additional access to NYC as well as local spots. The local neighborhood surrounding the apartment is just as interesting as NYC and everyone knows the best views of Manhattan are actually from the Jersey City waterfront (a great place for a stroll, run or photo op). Grove Street is just as convenient as Manhattan in many ways and you will find yourself a short walk from dozens of restaurants, bars and shops. The area boasts several parks (including Liberty State Park with Liberty Science Center as well as access to the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island), ice rinks, Newport Mall (130 stores and a movie theater), boating, and performance venues.. Several farmer’s markets, craft fairs, live outdoor music, holiday events and a midnight foodie market lend to the local vibe. You will also find a huge amount of diversity in Jersey City,

name: Sunny, newly renovated one bedrm,  ideal location
description:
This apartment is on the top floor of the 3 family building overlooking the treetops of a beautiful tree-lined street. It’s ideally located within a few blocks to all the best restaurants, shops, parks and amenities that Hoboken has to offer. It is only 7 blocks to the Path train station and just one block to the NYC bound bus stop. For anyone doing business in NYC or is just coming to enjoy the sites, the community spirit of Hoboken is a welcome relief to the bustle of the Big Apple.

The space
This newly renovated apartment contains everything needed for your stay: microwave, toaster, coffee machine, towels and linens, dishware, flatware and cutlery are provided. The WIFI is high speed Verizon.

Guest access
This is a good location to walk or take public transit.
Public transit to Manhattan is easy; the #126 bus stops at 5th and Washington (just a block away). This bus is also handy to take to Trader Joe’s and restaurants furt
neighborhood_description: The neighborhood is a friendly and safe area with beautiful parks nearby.  The riverside promenade and parks are only 2 blocks away for the most spectacular views of Manhattan and the maritime activities on the majestic Hudson River.

name: 1 Bedroom in Hoboken Waterfront Building, Minutes to NYC
description:
This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 20 years of experience in the industry. The upscale, pet-friendly building’s amenities include 24-hour concierge service, a fitness center, outdoor sundecks, two children's play areas and a resident lounge with a screening room. The surrounding city of Hoboken provides small-town charm removed from the hustle and bustle of New York City, despite being just minutes from Manhattan. Enjoy easy access to NYC via bus, PATH train and NY Waterway ferry service.

The space
This colorful Hoboken one-bedroom apartment features parquet flooring, ample closet space and an in-unit washer/dryer. The bed provided is queen size, fitted with plush linens and pillows. All Furnished Quarters apartments include: • Fully equipped kitchen • HDTV with cable service • Utilities and domestic phone • Complimentary WiFi • 24/7 guest
neighborhood_description: Hoboken, located in northeast New Jersey right outside of Manhattan, offers the perfect blend of a cosmopolitan city with the warmth and personality of a small-town community. The tree-lined sidewalks, cobblestone streets and vintage brownstones create a pleasant, charismatic vibe and an escape from the hustle and bustle of New York City. Hoboken’s waterfront location also provides beautiful views of the Manhattan skyline and the New York Harbor. Outdoor cafes, waterfront restaurants, international cuisine, art galleries, bars and boutiques are found everywhere. Head to Washington Street for shopping, see a concert at Pier A Park or take a stroll along the Hudson River Waterfront Walkway. The PATH train, a 24-hour subway system, provides easy and convenient access from the Hoboken station to Midtown and Lower Manhattan in just 20 minutes.

name: Spacious Hoboken Apartment!
description:
Recently renovated 2 bed/2 bath apartment in a central Hoboken location! Stainless steel appliances, newly refinished floors, and large open living space. Great summer stay for those with seasonal jobs, internships, or taking summer classes!

The space
The space is great for work from home or those taking summer classes! Each bedroom is equipped with 2 desks and the apartment has speedy 1 Gig wifi. The open kitchen and living space is perfect for guests who love to cook and hang out together! Guests are also welcome to use the building’s shared courtyard with picnic tables and benches for when the weather is too beautiful to pass up.

Guest access
Hoboken is a charming one square mile, making everything walkable! The Hoboken Light Rail train is a short 2 block walk away from the apartment. It stops along other points in Hoboken and Jersey City for further exploring and is a quick ride to the Path train to NYC! ShopRite, Hoboken’s largest groc
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken is a charming one square mile, making everything walkable! The Hoboken Light Rail train is a short 2 block walk away from the apartment. It stops along other points in Hoboken and Jersey City for further exploring and is a quick ride to the Path train to NYC! ShopRite, Hoboken’s largest grocery store, is also only two blocks from the apartment for convenient food shopping. As Mutz capital of the US, you do not want to miss out on the plethora of Italian eateries throughout Hoboken – everything from old school delis to fine dining. Many of Hoboken’s restaurants and shops can be found on Washington Street, an 8 minute walk from the apartment.

Some of our favorite local places to eat in Hoboken & Jersey City Heights:
M&P Biancomano's: 11th and Washington Street
Benny Tudino's - Home of the largest slice: 6th and Washington Street
Renato's Pizza Master: Hutton and Central Ave
Otto Strada: 8th and Park Ave
La Isla: 1st and Washington Street
A

name: Charming Flat in the Heart of West Village
description:
Charming 1-bedroom apartment on a tree-lined street in the heart of Greenwich Village. Quintessential NY. The city's best restaurants, cafes, and jazz clubs are here. Easy walk to Whitney, Chelsea galleries, Meatpacking, Soho, river. Most trains are 1-2 blocks away. Renovated kitchen/bath. And best of all, the apartment faces in (but still open), so a rare QUIET apartment in NY for a good-night sleep! NOTE, the apartment is pretty small, as are most apartments in the village in this price range.

The space
Newly renovated kitchen and bathroom with colorful palette. Espresso maker, French press, tea infusers - everything you need for a perfectly-cozy NY stay. Spacious bedroom. Dedicated guest closet space.

Guest access
Everything

Other things to note
The apartment is a bit small, as are all others in this neighborhood in this price range. But bath and kitchen renovations make up for it and guests have loved it.

name: Cozy 2BR Garden Suite w/ Patio | Near NYC & DT JC
description:
This is a cozy & eclectic 2-bdrm garden level apt w/ easy free street parking, private entrance & small patio w/ seating. The kitchen is newly renovated w/ brand new appliances, apt is thoughtfully updated, & a little suburban oasis vibe w/ close proximity to downtown & major roads.

In unit W/D, full bath, TV+WiFi, &thoughtful touches are all available. Perfect stay for business travelers, students, traveling nurses, etc to check out JC, NYC, Newark and surrounding cities. Welcome to our home!

The space
Easy street parking + a private entrance for your stay. Please note that street parking is alternate side parking, & the street cleaning person will usually honk & give you a chance to move your car. Private entrance at the side of house behind a gate, motion sensor lights + camera. The suite is located behind the garage/wood shop used by the owners, with the owners occupying the top unit. There is a cozy patio area with seating to enjoy on nice days
neighborhood_description:
Our beautiful garden suite is located on the ground level of a multi family home in a residential enclave right in downtown Jersey City with close proximity to McGinley Square.

Jersey City is the most diverse city in NJ - which means great local food options! Madame Claude Biis, Wurstbar, Brightside Tavern, Liberty House, The Maritime, Surf City Bar, Porta, Ani Ramen, Rasoi, Second Street Bakery, Smorgasborg Harborside JC, East Wind Snack Shop, etc.

Local sights include Liberty State Park, Central Railroad of NJ Terminal, Statue of Liberty, Liberty Science Center, Van Vorst Park, Downtown JC pedestrian plaza w/ restaurants, bars, & shops, White Eagle Hall, and more.

Check out our Guidebook for more recs, or better yet - just ask us!

At end of dead end street for safety and privacy.

Guest access
Car not needed in this very walk & bike-able location along the waterfront (Citibank rental bikes one block away), minutes from his

name: Cute Studio Apartment in the Heights
description:
Charming studio apartment, steps away from public transit to NYC. Full kitchen and bath, private entrance on quiet street in Jersey City Heights. Walk to bars, coffee shops, restaurants, and two public parks with gorgeous city views. Five minute walk to 9th Street Light Rail - 30 minute train to NYC or express bus to Port Authority.

Guest access
Enjoy complete privacy with your own secure entrance, and access to front patio.

License number
STR20-00101
neighborhood_description: Jersey City Heights offers easy access to Manhattan, and also lots of fun and quirky neighborhood bars and restaurants. Washington park (just a block away) has tennis, basketball, playgrounds and beautiful gardens. You'll find everything you need on Central Avenue (just a 5 minute walk) including groceries, drugstores, and eclectic shops. Jersey City is known for its chill and diverse urban landscape, with beautiful street art and amazing ethnic cuisine. We're only a five minute drive from downtown galleries and boutiques. Or take the 9th Street Elevator to explore Hoboken's unique restaurants and shops.

name: The Concrete Jungle Escape - Skyline Views!
description:
Welcome to your home away from home.

The space
BZR Stays is committed to designing a diverse & exclusive level of stay to travelers, for either business or personal. We believe you can live anywhere, and belong everywhere. We offer contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support. We’ve committed ourselves to ensuring that our sanitization procedures and cleaning standards follow the guidance of the CDC and the World Health Organization.

- Self check-in
- Professionally cleaned
- 24/7 virtual concierge via text, email, or phone
- Utilities including in-suite washer/dryer
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- High-Speed WIFI
- Breakfast essentials (coffee, tea, oatmeal)


Note: This property is within a gated community to protect its residents. If you are arriving with your own vehicle, you will need find parking on the adjacent streets.

The space
This is a one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartme
neighborhood_description: Welcome to Jersey City, NJ - America's Golden Door! The Concrete Escape is minutes away from Downtown Jersey City and the Waterfront. A 5 minute drive away from the Grove Street PATH Station - where a 3 stop train ride will bring you to the World Trade Center in New York City. The apartment is surrounded by local shops and restaurants, and bikers might enjoy the City Bike stations throughout the City. For a night out, we highly recommend stopping by some Restaurant favorites - The Boil (Erie Street), The Ashford (Grove Street), DOMODOMO (Greene Street), and Ani Ramen (Newark Ave)

name: Beautiful Boutique Studio W Washer/Dryer In Unit
description:
Welcome to my beautiful place, if you're looking for a "full time" airbnb that hosts multiple guests this isn't it. I live here but travel for work and rent it out LEGALLY for 31 days MINIMUM. My furniture is from restoration hardware and i have quite a bit of art and personal touches in my place. My mattress is Keetsa and both my kitchen and bathroom are stocked with the best essentials. Theres a washer/dryer inside my unit and you will have access to the gym in the building

The space
I take amazing care of my place and rent it out very selectively. Theres absolutely no partying or smoking in the unit. My kitchen and bathroom are marble and i provide a Nespresso machine as well as le cruset cookware. My TV is 50 inches, i have apple TV connected to it and my WIFI is business grade. My building is amazing, i have full time doormen as well as a package room and a great gym that you'll have access to.
neighborhood_description: FIDI Wall St. is the most iconic neighbourhood in NYC.  I am next to every subway line as well as Seaport and Battery Park

description:
This classic mid-block brick rowhouse is located on a beautiful tree lined street, 2 blocks from the main commercial strip and 4 blocks from the Hudson Waterfront. The 2 bed, 2 bath parlor level apartment is a full floor flat with 11’ high ceilings and large windows facing the street and backyard. The apartment was recently renovated to draw out the buildings rustic charm while upgrading with modern amenities.

Note we only rent the apartment to families.

The space
Coming up the front stoop- a secure entry beings you into a shared hallway from which you enter into an open living, dining and kitchen area. Old brick walls have been exposed and run the length of the flat while a fully modern kitchen with Cararra marble surfaces separates the public open area from the 2 bedrooms in the rear. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, and ample closet space. The second bedroom can accommodate a toddler bed, small twin bed or crib- whatever you might need
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken used to be an italian town in the 70s which and over the past years it has seen an inflow of students (that attend Stevens University... with amazing views to Manhattan that we recommend) and families with kids. For this reason you will find a variety of great parks for the kids to play in.

Because of it's italian heritage Hoboken is packed with really good italian places (Marguerita and Zero Otto Uno) being our favorite ones. If you are looking for more variety and are tired of Manhattan you walk walk up to Jersey City Heights and enjoy cuban, peruvian, japanese food... whatever you are in the mood for!

name: RARE 2BR Brownstone Parlor w/ 11 ft. Ceilings
description:
The parlor floor of a beautiful brownstone in the heart of Hoboken. Beautiful sun-drenched, two bedroom condo has original moldings, 11-foot ceilings, inlaid flooring, exposed brick, beautiful pocket doors, stunning ceiling medallions and gorgeous light fixtures. Kitchen and bath upgraded with marble and subway tile, a 65" smart TV in the living room, and new appliances, including washer/dryer!

Short walk to the water and PATH train, one stop from the West Village in Manhattan.

The space
There are two bedrooms with full size beds. One bedroom features an adjustable bed with electronic control to get the perfect night's sleep. The kitchen was renovated in 2020 with subway tile, farm sink, carrera-marble style quartz and stainless steel dishwasher. The living room has chairs from Pottery Barn and a sofa from Maiden Home. There are ample books to read on the shelves for the curious. The dining room seats 8 people and each room has a unique chandeli
neighborhood_description:
The neighborhood is an upscale family neighborhood, very safe and quiet, a perfect retreat just minutes from the city, which is one stop away on the PATH train.

Right outside the apartment is the beautiful Church Square Park, which has basketball courts, a small and large dog park, and is a great place to picnic on weekends. During the spring, Hoboken's farmers market is right outside the building every Tuesday. Papersource, Anthropologie, Aspen Market, Starbucks, and Sephora, as well as many other shops and restaurants are all around the corner on Washington St. The brownstone is just a short distance from the beautiful Hoboken waterfront, the PATH train, and bus station, and is a quick trip to NYC (just one stop from the West Village).

name: WATER Views |  Luxury building Studio | WALL ST
description:
Breathtaking Views of the River, City and the Park. Spacious, and bright (oversized windows) Studio loft apartment. The apartment is in a luxury building with 24/7 doorman and access to the waterfront parks, Downtown Sightseeing & Dining and several supermarkets - including Whole Foods. Luxury full service building with GYM, Lounge, Laundry. Central Location, walk to everything!

The space
Fully furnished and equipped Loft Studio Apartment has everything for a comfortable long-term stay.

Queen size bed with a comfortable mattress and crisp white cotton linens.
Large sofa and an Apple TV.
Dining table with chairs to enjoy your morning coffee with a view of the river, or a glass of wine looking at the sunset.
Closet with hangers and tons of shelves - empty and ready for you to unpack.
Fully equipped kitchen with coffee maker, glassware, plates and silverware. Wine Glasses and Whiskey glasses included too!

Beautiful white

name: cozy acurate
description:
Welcome to Bayonne Bliss !

This is a 1-bedroom residence with a main entrance of the building using a lockbox .

The entire place will be available during your stay !

Free street parking just look at the street parking signs.

Located close to a huge park with tennis, golf, basketball courts and near Walmart,Costco,Houlihan,Texas Steak House,OTAIKO etc

Park have children playgrounds, workout stations, walking trails, view of the bridge and Marina.

It’s a cozy getaway for relaxation !

The space
This is a 1-bedroom residence with the entire place being available to you only during your stay.

There is one main entrance of the building but a private entrance to get inside the apartment.

Bayonne Bliss has free street parking to park your vehicle. Just make sure to look at the parking signs for street cleaning days to see which days you can or can’t park on that particular side

name: Designer Renovated Hoboken 1 Bed close to NYC
description:
Gut renovated designer 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of downtown Hoboken. Located near the numerous restaurants, shops, and markets in walkable Hoboken. Only a few blocks to the PATH train for easy access to Manhattan. Features free wifi, large TV, comfortable accommodations, in unit washer & dryer, chef's kitchen, spa-like walk in shower, exposed brick, and spacious, quiet bedroom.

The space
Designer renovated unit in classic Hoboken rowhouse. Charming elements like exposed brick and crown molding accentuate the modern renovations.

Guest access
You'll have access to the entire apartment and self check in via lockbox.

Other things to note
Please note, street parking in Hoboken is for permitted residents only. If you plan on bringing a car, we recommend you make plans for parking in advance. There are two public parking garages on the block.
neighborhood_description: Hoboken is a square mile walkable town with tree lined streets, boutique shops, nightlife, restaurants, and easy access to Manhattan and NYC.

name: Luxury 1BR Sanctuary in Prime Jersey City Spot
description:
Streaks of luxury alongside comfort and location.

Plug n play workstation (dual monitors, desk, keyboard, mouse), Rainfall shower, heated floors, washer/dryer, Central heat/AC, home automation, brick, designer tiling, French doors. High end 75" TV (Living room) and 5.1 surround sound.

The space
Modern tech with a salute to contemporary style. Find the design of the apartment carefully planned out including an extendable sofa converted into additional seating, a fold down dining table and fold up counterspace in the kitchen.

For those interested, various smart home devices can be controlled by phone (front door lock, thermostat, heated floors, ceiling fan). Ample closet space with LED strip lighting. Modern washer dryer (in unit).

Don't forget to experience the 5.1 surround sound system with top tier speakers coupled with a high-end 75" Sony HDR 4K TV which has made movie theatres obsolete to many.

List of Extra features
neighborhood_description:
Hamilton Park is a lovely community with great restaurants, bars, cafes, and other local businesses all within walking distance. Further south towards Grove St area (6-8 minute walk) you will find more bars and restaurants and a livelier nightlife.

Just outside to the east is Newport Mall as well as the Jersey City offices of many major companies such as Citi JPMorgan, UBS, Societe Generale, HSBC, Bank of America, Cigna, RBS, BNP Paribas, AXA among others. All walking distance from the apartment

name: Modern 1BR1BA-Minutes to NYC & DOWNTOWN JC:Parking
description:
Welcome to The #HilltopHideawayJC steps from PATH subway station for quick transit into downtown/midtown NYC. Also a quick walk to all that Downtown Jersey City has to offer (Restaurants, bars, parks, shops, etc.) PRIVATE PARKING SPOT AVAILABLE

COVID-19 Cleaning Compliant Comfortable & Spacious private 1 bed 1 bath apartment on the ground floor (on grade ) in a Victorian building features new kitchen & bathroom & outside porch.

Ideal for couples, business travelers, families with kids.

The space
Modern, spacious apartment featuring cozy & thoughtful touches throughout.

Living room features large Smart TV, comfy couches, Klipsch Bluetooth Speaker & vintage bar cart.

Next to living room is a cozy reading nook with comfy chair, as well as games & books.

New bathroom features herringbone marble tile & large bathtub.

Renovated kitchen features brand new appliances (Dishwasher, microwave, fridge)
neighborhood_description:
The Hilltop is a quiet and secluded neighborhood in booming Jersey City. A short walk to the PATH Subway that gets to downtown or midtown Manhattan in less than 20 minutes makes this the perfect spot for business trips, visiting family or taking in all that the NYC Metro has to offer the modern traveler.

The #HilltopHideawayJC is also steps away from Downtown Jersey City, which has blossomed into a destination in and of itself. Nightlife, events, restaurants, museums & parks are at your fingertips and even in a "covid world" there are opportunities to explore and experience.

name: Sonder Battery Park | Studio Apartment w/ Peloton
description:
From the moment you see the waterfront from the roof, you’ll know you made the right choice. Your Sonder comes with its own kitchenette, a dining nook, en-suite laundry, and a Peloton. There’s also a (seasonal) rooftop pool to go along with that waterfront view we mentioned, a fitness center, a golf simulator, and a co-working space. You’ll be right across from The Battery — a waterfront oasis with 195,000 square feet of perennial gardens. The New York Stock Exchange, Wall Street, and One World Trade Center are also a quick walk away.

The space
Working, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Peloton bike, compatible with standard athletic sneakers only
- En-suite laundry
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast and HDMI cord
neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

name: Big 2BR apartment with private patio in NYC!
description:
Located in the highly desirable West Village, this apartment is located in one of the most serene areas in all of New York. Make yourself at home in this urban oasis, fully equipped with a smart TV, Wifi, stainless steel appliances, central AC, and a private backyard patio (a rare luxury in NYC). Clean sheets and towels, as well as toiletries, are provided. Citi bike and public transit are located steps away. The property is disinfected between every visit.

The space
The private backyard patio has a grill and a table that can seat six people. Queen-size memory foam beds and ample closet space in both bedrooms. Fully equipped kitchen (Fridge, Dishwasher, Microwave, Oven, and Nespresso machine). Full-size pull-out sofa bed located in the living room. 43" Smart TV in the living room. Linens, towels, and toiletries provided.

Guest access
You’ll have the entire place to yourself, private entrance included!
neighborhood_description: The West Village is located in one of the most serene areas in all of Manhattan. Tree-lined streets show off the area's numerous historic brownstones and help create an atmosphere that makes the West Village feel separate from the hustle and bustle of the rest of Manhattan. Eclectic shops and world-class cuisine can be found on every block. Small neighborhood parks create a network of charming green spaces. A short walk away, you can find the Hudson River Park, the Meatpacking district, and famous local eats like Magnolia Bakery.

name: Airy 2B1B Apartment w/ Parking 11 min to Manhattan
description:
This is Mavis and Ted! Welcome to our home!

We offer an entire apartment that is located perfectly between downtown Jersey City, Journal Square, and McGinley Square. Our accommodations offer a full kitchen, lots of closet space, a wonderful view of uptown Manhattan (you get a picture frame view of the Empire State Building from the dining table.) If you want to explore Manhattan we are about 10 minutes walking distance to the PATH train direct to Manhattan (11 Minutes to World Trade Center.)

The space
Our home was built in 1870 and still has the original marble fireplace and mantle. Our neighborhood is very quiet and off of (but not too far from) major thoroughfares.

We live in the first two floors, the apartment is in the third floor with private entrance. This is our home and we try our best to offer you a home experience. We appreciated if you treat is as your home as well.

Airbnb is not a standard hotel, what we offer is you
neighborhood_description:
There are a number of small Cafes and restaurants within several blocks ( Filipino Bread House, Pizzerias, several great Indian Restaurants.) If you are willing to walk 10-15 minutes Downtown JC and Little India are within reach and full of a diverse range of culinary treasures. We are also located a short distance from the oldest private residence in the US on Sip Ave as well as near White Eagle Hall (0.3 miles)

Quiet hours in our neighborhood is 10pm to 8am.

name: Great Summer 2 Bed/2 Bath Stay!
description:
This beautiful 2 bedroom apartment is a few blocks away from the bus and train into Manhattan where you will be in the heart of Times Square in 20 minutes. The location couldn't be better with numerous bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and various other stores within a walk-able distance. The night life in Hoboken on the weekends is a must. This apartment sleeps 5 people comfortably.

The space
The apartment is over 850 Square Feet! The apartment is kept very clean and the carpet in both bedrooms is brand new. The kitchen is stocked with pots and pans, cups, plates, and a working refrigerator, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. The apartment has hardwood floors and a tiled bathroom.

The space is great for work from home or those taking summer classes! Each bedroom is equipped with 2 desks and the apartment has speedy 1 Gig wifi. The open kitchen and living space is perfect for guests who love to cook and hang out together!

Guest access
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken is a square mile city across the Hudson river from New York City. Hoboken is rich in night life as is boasts the most bars per square mile anywhere in the United States. Guests may take a bus or a train to Manhattan in 20 minutes. The town is extremely safe and there are tons of great places to view the Manhattan Skyline.

Some of our favorite local places to eat in Hoboken & the Heights:
M&P Biancomano's: 11th and Washington Street
Benny Tudino's - Home of the largest slice: 6th and Washington Street
Renato's Pizza Master: Hutton and Central Ave
Otto Strada: 8th and Park Ave
La Isla: 1st and Washington Street
Amanda's: 9th and Washington Street

name: Relaxing Hoboken Getaway <20 min to NYC
description:
Welcome home to your spacious, sun filled 1 bed 1 bath stay located in a WALKUP on a quiet street in trendy Hoboken. It’s conveniently located close to a variety of dining and shopping options and transportation to NYC.

Our apartment has all the comforts of home and anything you will need for your stay whether its for business or leisure. Working remotely is a breeze with high speed wifi, and quiet neighbors. Your comfort is our priority, we want you to enjoy every aspect of your stay.

The space
OUR APARTMENT
Situated in a residential building in a great area of Hoboken. During your stay you will enjoy a beautifully designed living space that combines contemporary style with all of the relaxing comforts of home.

LIVINGROOM
The living room features comfortable furnishings, a QUEEN sleeper sofa, a reading chair, a Smart TV, and high-speed wifi for your streaming and remote-work needs. We have a variety of games for guest use! <
neighborhood_description:
During your stay in our historic city, you will be within walking distance to a variety of amazing places to shop, eat and explore! Our neighborhood is quiet and is conveniently located close to transportation into NYC and just a 10 minute walk from bustling Washington Street, and a 15 minute walk to the beautiful Hoboken waterfront.

PARKING
Please note that the apartment DOES NOT come with parking. You are responsible to arrange your parking if you have a car.

PAID street parking via the ParkMobile app is available, though limited. Take note of POSTED SIGNAGE for street cleaning times and resident parking permit signage. Do NOT park on streets marked for resident parking permits.

Nearby PAID Parking Garages:
Hoboken Parking Utility/Midtown Garage at 330 Clinton St, Hoboken
215 Hudson Street, Hoboken
315 Hudson Street, Hoboken
28 2nd Street, Hoboken
371 4th Street, Hoboken

Living/dining w/2 separate sleeping areas adjacent to living room. 1 queen bed in 1 sleeping area. In 2nd smaller sleeping area is a bunk-bed unit w/2 single beds, 1 over other. Sleeping areas separated from each other by 8' solid construction wall (ceilings are 12'8'), from living area by sliding fabric room dividers. Kitchen, full bath/private laundry.Message us first with your dates

The space
Top location in great downtown area, with easy access to most tourist destinations in Manhattan. Nearby 4* restaurants. Well equipped/outfitted with 1 queen bed in 1 sleeping area adjacent to living area. There is also a bunkbed unit in 2nd sleeping area, so works well for a couple or traveling with 1 younger child. Apt is prepared with all bed linens right before arrival. Each guests is provided with a complete set of linens and towels, as we have a private gues

name: Sonder City Hall Park | Spacious Studio Apartment
description:
The hustle and bustle of the Financial District magically melts away as soon as you step through City Hall Park’s French-style doors and into the stunning entryway of floor-to-ceiling greenery. This urban gem sits just off Broadway among some of the most well-known locations on Wall Street. With City Hall Park to the north and Battery Park to the south, you have easy access to verdant oases among the concrete jungle of the Big Apple. The exciting blend of the metropolitan and the organic spills into every room, where biophilic design and bright, modern touches transform every space into a personal retreat. Here to work? The communal laundry facilities and room options with double workspaces make it easy to perform at your best. Here to play? The city is your oyster, and we can’t wait to see what you discover.

The space
Working, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virt
neighborhood_description: High-rises, cobbled streets, and the New York Stock Exchange. At the southern tip of Manhattan Island, the Financial District is one of the city’s most historic areas. And this neighborhood is more than just a financial hub. Find iconic monuments and stunning mid-century architecture on every block. Catch the ferry from Wall Street for East River views of the Statue of Liberty and the Brooklyn Bridge. Or to get a taste of local delights, there are sidewalk cafes for cozy coffees and Stone Street dive bars for happy-hour drinks. Whether you’re the Charging Bull or the Fearless Girl — FiDi is for you.

name: West Village Clubhouse Great for Shoots + Stays
description:
Welcome to our West Village Clubhouse. A beacon of old New York charm, flooded with natural light, plant life and inspiration to keep your eye wandering throughout your visit.

This bright 1500 sq ft loft is a rare gem to come by available for rent in the West Village these days.

Find yourself right at home with a fully equipped kitchen, loft office area, smart TV, and internet. Private brownstone with staff upon request.

Great for photoshoots + filming (rates vary), gatherings + stays.

The space
The master bedroom includes two single beds that are set up as a queen but can be separated, through the master bedroom is a small guest room and in the loft area above the living area is a double bed.

Bedroom windows face south into quintessential quiet West Village street, Living room has a large sky light and windows facing north into the garden. This is to floor walk up of a private brownstone with security surveillance

This unit is a spacious 1 bedroom located at the heart of downtown Jersey City. From the room, you can see the Statue of Liberty right out of the windows, and commute to Manhattan is light speed. This is your best choice when traveling to New York and New Jersey.

When making a reservation, please kindly provide a brief introduction of your party and purpose of stay. I’ll get back to you ASAP. Due to high demand, please don’t take it personal if I can’t host you.

The space
My apartment is a spacious 1B1B located at one of the top notch residential buildings in Jersey City. You can get the best experience for a very affordable price. A 3-star Marriott hotel next door usually costs $200+ per night, and their rooms are like bento boxes.

Guest access
You get on-site paid garage (Jersey City market price, not charged by me), or plenty of free street parking. Besides the apartment itself, you also get access to all the building amenitie

It is a safe, dynamic neighborhood with a lot of young professionals and students.

name: One of a Kind Tribeca Loft, Terrace, Water Views
description:
Triple exposure Tribeca loft with large Private terrace and open panoramic views. Perched high in the Tower portion of the art deco Tower 270 Condominium, more than 20 oversized windows stream abundant light from the south, west and north. Two bedroom, two bathroom double corner residence with tall 10ft 4in ceilings, 1729sf inside plus a spacious 700sf outdoor terrace with sweeping views overlooking Tribeca and the Hudson River.

The space
The 20ft corner bedroom is generously proportioned with seven windows south and west, walk-in-closet and windowed bathroom. The 20ft northern bedroom has access to the terrace and a bathroom with deep soaking tub and separate shower stall. Vented chefs kitchen with Subzero and Miele appliances. LG washer and dryer. Fitness room with Peloton bike on this floor. Tower 270 is a full service Tribeca condo built in 1930 with a grand art deco lobby, doorman, concierge, fitness rooms, bike room, play room, laundry and a landscaped roof
neighborhood_description:
In the heart of one of New York’s oldest historic districts with historic buildings and architecture from the 1920’s and before.
Close to the beautiful waterfront Rockefeller park with view on Statue of Liberty and breathtaking sunsets, walking distance to Battery Park and marina for nice sunset drinks (if you ever want to leave our terrace).

description:
This artsy and spacious apartment is located in the up and coming town of Bayonne. Centrally located, you'll have easy access to the bustling social scene in downtown Jersey City, an exciting trip to Liberty Science Center and Liberty State Park, the hip night life of Hoboken, connections to NYC - just minutes from Staten Island and Brooklyn. Within walking distance from local eateries, boutiques, and entertainment. Parking is included with your stay and pets and children are always welcome!

The space
This casual and spacious unit features a large bedroom with a super comfy California King sized bed. TVs in both the living room and bedroom are equipped with Roku streaming device so you can access your favorite subscription. We offer super fast Verizon wifi, board games for fun night in, complimentary coffee, tea, and wine for your enjoyment.
There's an extra fold-out rollaway bed to maximize occupancy for 3 guests, high chair, and pack and play for
neighborhood_description:
Conveniently located in the up and coming city of Bayonne, you're literally within walking distance from everything you could possibly need. Try out a delicious breakfast at a popular bistro just down the block or the bagel shop across the street. A few blocks down visit the best diner in town, go bowling, or grab a coffee (light and sweet of course) at DD. Nearby shopping center includes a Walgreens pharmacy, international food market, and several fast food options.
Buses to and from NYC are just steps from the apartment, as well as light rail station nearby to local attractions and shopping mall. By car you're just a few minutes from Newark International Airport, Liberty State Park and Liberty Science Center, American Dream Mall and the Mills at Jersey Gardens Outlet Mall. Hop on the NJ Turnpike just a few blocks away to any destination in North or South Jersey. Enjoy a day trip to the Jersey Shore!

name: Cozy Two-Bdrm Haven in Bustling Financial District
description:
Listing formerly for 1-bedroom, but due to family circumstances out of state, I am renting out my place as a 2-bdrm.
Spacious, comfortable and light-filled apartment in the heart of the Financial District. The luxury apartment building provides full service amenities with a doorman, elevator and laundry facilities. The neighborhood is central to every attraction in the Seaport and Financial District - dining, shopping and more! Plus ease of NYC ferry, subway lines and Citi bikes within a block.

The space
Both bedrooms have their own door, closet, AC and large windows. They are furnished with a queen bed and dresser/nightstand. There is a TV in one room and the second bedroom can be used as an office with a working desk set-up. The apartment is quiet and on a high floor and gets plenty of light throughout the day.

Guest access
As a guest, you will have access to your bedroom, the bathroom, kitchen/dining area and living room.
neighborhood_description: The Financial District is very underrated. The close proximity to One World Trade Center,  South Street Seaport, Brookfield and Westfield Mall, The Battery and Wagner Parks are just some of the local treasures which make living downtown so unique. Not to mention the amazing world-class restaurants, museums and attractions in nearby neighborhoods - Tribeca, Battery Park City, Chinatown, SoHo and Nolita are less than 20 minutes by foot. And the best kept secret? The South Ferry (better than the subway), which can take you to DUMBO in Brooklyn or even The Statue of Liberty. Downtown living is truly the BEST!

Featuring your own private keyless entry, spacious layout with designer touches, fully equipped kitchen, private patio, and modern amenities such Wi-Fi, Alexa, and smart TV.
If you are looking for a short getaway and appreciate upscale style, this is the perfect place to relax and refresh. For extended stays, settle in & experience your new home away from home.

Guest access
The location is a walker's paradise. It is around the corner from bustling Washington Street - “Main Street” (but away from the noise) with plenty of great restaurants (some offer BYOB), bars, shops, boutiques and grocery stores. The Hoboken Waterfront with a picturesque view of Manhattan is just a few blocks away. Enjoy panoramic views of Manhattan coupled with a calmer pace of life: parks for picnics and walking/biking paths along the Hudson River.

neighborhood_description:
Neighborhood: Situated between two beautifully historical churches and close to bars and restaurants, but also on a very quiet street.

History: two major waves of immigration, first of German speakers and then of Spanish speakers, greatly influenced the development and character of Union City. Its two nicknames, "Embroidery Capital of the United States" and "Little Havana on the Hudson," reflect important aspects of that history. Thousands visit Union City each year to see the nation's longest-running passion play and the annual Cuban Day Parade of New Jersey.

neighborhood_description: McGinley Square is an area of Jersey City that is quickly gaining popularity as a hotspot and is also considered the heart of Jersey City. Located near the middle of the city, south of Journal Square, the “square” itself is at the intersection of two of the city’s major thoroughfares, Montgomery Street and Bergen Avenue. This neighborhood is quickly burgeoning with lots of shops, restaurants, bars — and new places to explore. The McGinley Square Special Improvement District has also helped in boosting this neighborhood, creating a weekly pop-up Pedestrian Plaza on weekends.

name: " Cozy, Modern  studio apt with private entrance"
description:
Our guest studio apartment in Jersey City is 3 min walk to Path Journal Square train station! This garden level apartment has a private entrance from the street. Amenities include washer dryer, kitchenette, central heat and air. The neighborhood is diverse with variety of eateries. Taxi, Uber, city bikes and bus terminal are walking distances. New York City is 15 min train ride by PATH train. Local spots include Liberty Science Center, Ellis Island ( Statue of Liberty), down town marina.

The space
The apartment has a desk and chair for working from home. A full size bed and a sofa bed for extra sleeping arrangement. Some traffic noise may be experienced as it is close to the main road. However we will provide earplugs for your convenience. Enjoy free strong WiFi, central air and heating. Common washer and dryer are located adjacent to the back exit door.

Our residential neighborhood is an urban-suburban mixed feel with easily accessible public transportation. The neighbors around are friendly. It is also safe and quiet at night.

Central Wall st. location - downtown dining, shopping, riverfront parks, all subway lines and city bikes.

The space
Awake in this majestic 1 bedroom home looking through the city. This residence features over wide plank cerused oak floor, 10 ft lofted ceilings, in-unit washer/dryer, spa-like bathroom and open city views.

The kitchen design is lavished with a true chef’s dream space in mind complete with Caeserstone countertops, lacquered kitchen cabinetry in addition to appliances by Liebherr, Bosch, Miele. Spa-like marble bathroom with soaking tub, double sink vanity.

Other things to note

With easy access to many subway lines, city bikes, to top city restaurants like The Fulton, Crown Shy, Temple Court, Nobu, and food markets Eataly, Whole Foods, Le District and many more, there’s something for everyone. There’s also the South Street Seaport and Pier 17 a short distance away with its many shops and eateries situated on the East River with stunning views of Brooklyn and Manhattan’s historic bridges. Walking distance to Tribeca, Soho and the Village.

name: Peaceful Japanese Ryokan in the heart West Village
description:
Think Blade Runner meets Kyoto - A unique Japanese ryokan experience in the heart of West Village, perfect for solo travelers.

You will be surrounded by the best bars, restaurants, and shopping areas in West Village, with Chelsea Market, Whitney Museum, and the High Line just around the corner. You will have easy access to other parts of Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens with the subway just 5 minutes walking distance away.

The space
Inspired by ryokan homes in Japan, this west village studio is curated with a minimalist touch. This experience might not be for everyone - your bedroom is designed with traditional Japanese tatami mats and a queen sized futon mattress enough for two - be ready to experience the ryokan lifestyle and you might leave with a stronger backbone.

IMPORTANT:
During summer, there will be no AC, but fans will be provided to keep the space ventilated and airy. The apartment doesn't face direct sunlight, so it stays r
neighborhood_description: The West Village draws fashionable crowds to its designer boutiques and trendy restaurants. Quaint streets, some still cobblestoned, are lined with Federal-style townhouses and dotted with public squares. Notable venues include the Village Vanguard jazz club and the Stonewall Inn bar, site of the 1969 riots that launched the gay rights movement. The historically arty area also has piano bars, cabarets and theaters.

Beautiful sunlit filled apartment in prime location in Downtown Jersey City, 2 blocks to Path train- minutes to NYC.

name: Stylish 2 BR w/roof deck access - mins to NYC
description: Whether in town to holiday or here for work nearby, this lovely flat welcomes you home in style. With 1200 square feet (112 sq meters) of space, including an upscale kitchen, it is ideal for families and friends or a business travelers remote work location. neighborhood_description:
Downtown Hoboken houses some of the best the city has to offer. Stroll along the Hudson River on the Waterfront Walkway or take in the breathtaking view of New York City at sunset from Pier C Park. Continue downtown and visit the famous Carlo’s Bakery – You may even be featured on TLC’s hit show Cake Boss. Want to go into Manhattan? No problem! Downtown Hoboken offers ferries that regularly go back and forth. Have quick and easy access to Holland Tunnel, which connects you to Lower Manhattan.

Get in your dose of fresh air at Frank Sinatra Park or let the kids swing at Church Square Park. Grab a cocktail at Zack’s Oak Bar and Restaurant or plan a date night at Grand Vin. With some of the best restaurants in the city located downtown, you will always be able to satisfy your cravings. Choose between a variety of casual and luxury picks scattered throughout Downtown Hoboken and enjoy being in the center of all the city has to offer.

Stay in the garden! This newly renovated apartment occupies the garden level of a historic townhouse in downtown Jersey City. There is one bedroom, one bath, and a comfortable fold-out couch. Room for 4 adults, or 2 adults & 2 children. Enjoy coffee in the morning on your private patio! The kitchen is stocked for your use. Or go out and explore the trendy restaurants and shops of JC. The PATH train to NYC is a 10 min. walk from here. If you are driving please scroll down to read about parking.

The space
The apartment is designed to reflect the gardens that surround it. Both the front and back yards of this townhouse are gardens featuring native plants. Inside the apartment are paintings that reflect the gardens outside. The bedroom looks out onto your private patio, which also has seating for 4. The bathroom has a bathtub, shower head, and shower curtain. The living room/kitchen area has a table that seats 4; a Smart TV; and a variety of books and games for your

name: Stay in the heart of Historic Downtown!
description:
Welcome! Are you seeking big city excitement with small town feel? You're in the right place!

This lovely, cozy apartment sits on top of a historic, owner-occupied brownstone that has been updated with your every comfort in mind. We're located on a quaint residential street, in the heart of the city. The apartment is within walking distance of other neighborhoods in Downtown, a 10 minute walk to two PATH stations, and a short 10 minute PATH ride into New York City.

The space
You and your guest(s) have full access to the apartment and amenities. The apartment includes bedroom with seating and work areas, kitchen with dining area, and bathroom. The apartment is fully-furnished with a living area featuring king size bed and futon with all linens, built-in closet, dresser, Samsung TV, Apple TV, Bose sound bar, xBox Series X, and standing desk with ergonomic chair; fully-equipped kitchen with stove/oven, refrigerator/freezer, microwave, Keurig, and 4 perso
neighborhood_description:
Jersey City is part of Hudson County’s “Gold Coast,” a cluster of cities on the west bank of the Hudson River, located in NJ across from New York City. Jersey City is surrounded by other bustling urban areas – including NYC, Hoboken, and Weehawken. For a multi-city tour, hop on the PATH for a quick, 10 minute ride into our neighboring cities. Looking to check out the rest of the Gold Coast? Take the Light Rail up and down the Gold Coast into The Heights, McGinley Square, and Journal Square Jersey City; Hoboken, Weekhawken, and other notable cities/townships in Hudson County.

Want to stay closer to home? Downtown Jersey City is very walkable! We’re located right in Downtown, which is made up of many neighborhoods – all within walking distance of each other. From the the historic neighborhoods of Hamilton Park, Harsimus Cove, Powerhouse Arts District, The Village, and Van Vorst Park in Historic Downtown; to the modern neighborhoods of Exchange Place, Paulus Hook, and The Water

name: Sonder Duane Street | Spacious Queen Room
description:
The timeless glamour of Tribeca: art galleries, rows of 19th-century buildings, and laughter spilling from restaurants on every corner. Welcome to Duane Street, a charming building full of soft, rich colors, polished hardwood floors, and unexpected pops of art. Admire the exhibits at Bortolami, workout for free at Crunch Fitness, get lost in the views from Pier 25, or treat yourself with one of the delicious falafels from Nish Nush. It’s all right outside your door at Duane Street.

The space
Working, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- HDMI cord for streaming
- Plenty of space to work
- Access to Crunch Fitness - Tribeca (4 minute walk away)

What's nearby
- 1 minute walk to Tribeca’s Kitchen (the cl
neighborhood_description: Lights, camera, action! Welcome to Tribeca: center of the film industry and home to actors, musicians, and celebrities. Direct your own movie magic on these picturesque cobblestone streets. Industrial architecture, racing yellow taxi cabs, and laughter spilling from a restaurant on every corner. You can’t write the feeling of being in this neighborhood. Pier 25 at Hudson River Park has been transformed into a lively outdoors hangout, with miniature golf, beach volleyball, and sweeping views of Lady Liberty herself. For fresh oysters or frosty libations, take your pick of the buzzy bistros and bars. And with swanky music venues and stylish art gallery events to attend, your night has just begun in the city that never sleeps.

name: Modern Clean 3 BR/1BA w/ Queen Beds Close to NYC
description:
This 3-bedroom home boasts a crisp, contemporary feel while still feeling comfortable and inviting. Enjoy a convenient kitchenette, queen size beds, Smart TVs & fast Wifi. Parking available upon request. Laundry available in building. A perfect weekend getaway for a big group of family or friends to visit NYC & Jersey City.
✦ 4mins walk to the Light Rail station
✦ 30 mins to Manhattan with public transportation
✦ 7mins drive to Liberty State Park where you can enjoy the BEST NYC skyline view

The space
This apartment is locate on the second floor (one level above the ground), has three bedrooms and each has a queen-size bed. One bathroom. Fast Wifi, Two smart TVs, one in the living room the other one is the big bedroom. Driveway parking available upon request, laundry in the building. Bedding and towels provided.
neighborhood_description:
You can't see the view of the NYC skyline from the city itself. The best spot is from Jersey City. We are only 7mins drive away from the ‎Liberty State Park which is voted #1 best Manhattan view in Jersey City! Enjoy a relaxing dinner at the Liberty House Restuarant with iconic views of the NYC skyline, Ellis Island, and Lady Liberty.

Within 5 mins by drive, there are also a local brewery and a cocktail bar/distillery open until midnight.

Our residential neighborhood is an urban-suburban mixed feel with easily accessible public transportation. The neighbors around are friendly. It is also safe and quiet at night.

We have one security camera on the front porch and one facing the garage. They will be on during your stay. Parking peace of mind all time!

name: Stunning One Bedroom West Village
description:
In the heart of West Village, surrounded by cobblestoned streets lined with trees and gorgeous townhouses. A small town feel in a big city and steps away from trendy restaurants, jazz, wine bars, coffee shops, the best pizza in the city and terrific shopping at designer boutiques all within walking distance. Subway is located just around the corner which makes it extremely easy to get around and explore.

The space
Stunning true 1 bedroom apartment that was recently renovated, boasting a generous layout, high ceilings, oversized windows. You’ll have the entire 1 bedroom apartment that is spacious, clean, and comfortable. Located on the third floor of a quiet, classic New York building with elevator & mosaic tile lining the hallways. Strong, reliable WIFI for those working from home. There are Smart TVs & AC units in both the living room and bedroom.

NYC/Airbnb law compliant.

When you're in the kitchen, you'll feel like a chef. As you relax for the evening on the sofa, you'll know something of luxury. Functional and vibrant. The best of both.

The space
Come home to a dynamic space perfectly positioned in the heart of the Financial District. Located at the lower tip of Manhattan, Placemakr Wall Street, New York City in FiDi constantly buzzes with energy. This is the neighborhood for explorers, dealmakers, and pioneers. Excitement for the future can be found here with the NYSE, One World Trade Center, and the revitalized South Street Seaport, along with reminders from the past with museums dedicated to the 9/11 Memorial, the American Indian, and Jewish Heritage - all just a few blocks away.

You've never stayed in a space so vibrant, so multi-faceted, so adventurous. Tackle the world while you're here, or just take it all in. Either way, this is your place to call home for as long as you stay.

name: Serene Studio in the Heart of Greenwich Village
description:
Welcome to your New York City Oasis in Greenwich village, one of the most beautiful and vibrant neighborhoods in NYC. 1 min walk to subway, 10 min walk to Hudson River, 1 block from Bleeker St. Close to the best restaurants and cafes in the city. Quick walk to Washington Sq Park, the Highline, NYU, Union Square, etc. Perfect location to explore lower Manhattan and the rest of New York or just hide away from the hustle and bustle of the NYC life!

The space
Beautiful bright studio in the heart of Greenwich village. Equipped with queen size bed, workstation, dining area, bathroom, and kitchenette with full size appliances. Only 1 flight upstairs!

Other things to note
This studio is located on the 2nd floor, 1 flight of stairs. It is located on a very popular street in the heart of Greenwich Village.
neighborhood_description: Greenwich Village is a neighborhood on the west side of Lower Manhattan in New York City, bounded by 14th Street to the north, Broadway to the east, Houston Street to the south, and the Hudson River to the west. Greenwich Village also contains several subsections, including the West Village west of Seventh Avenue and the Meatpacking District in the northwest corner of Greenwich Village. Greenwich Village perfectly combines a bit of the East Village’s glorified grunge with a bit of the West Village’s tony charm. Home to NYU, the neighborhood offers something for all its eclectic residents. You’ll find new restaurants, indie movie theaters and comedy clubs around the corner from quiet blocks full of big brownstones and well-kept window boxes. Whether it’s a 24-hour falafel joint, a dark downstairs bar, or upscale furniture shops, the neighborhood appeals to anyone who relishes the culture, history and activity of the city. name: Remote Work Apartment With City Views by Anyplace
description:
Welcome to turn-key living in Manhattan with this 1 bedroom apartment by Anyplace. You'll have everything you need for a wonderful stay, including a fully equipped workspace that you won't find in any other rental.

The space
This apartment is situated in the heart of FiDi. Only 5 minutes walk to the WTC station and 9/11 memorial. There is no shortage of restaurants in this area, and the historic Seaport is within walking distance. Fulton Station with access to most lines. Only 13 minutes on the subway to Park Slope, Brooklyn, and 12 minutes to Union Square.

The apartment features a full home office with a standing desk, plug and play docking station with extended desktop. 1GB internet speed and Blue Yeti mic are also included. The kitchen is equipped with both a Keurig and Nespresso machine. It also features an induction stovetop and a dual microwave and convection oven. There are two smart TVs and an Apple TV.

The Howell is walking distance
neighborhood_description: The Howell is walking distance to numerous 24 hours drugstores, and all the student life around Pace University. The NYSE on Wall Street is only a few blocks away. description:
Trendy condo steps from downtown Hoboken and PATH train, providing a 15 minute commute to NYC. There are no shortages of restaurants, bars, and scenic views of NYC minutes away. Are you working remotely, or working on a project? Enjoy the office nook with duel computer monitors equipped and docking station.

Tired of high extra fees on Airbnb? Earn up to 50% of your cleaning fee back if left in reasonable condition.

The space
Situated on a quiet road a few blocks away from the main strip. This lively and rustic condo is on the second floor of a 3 story walkup. There is ample street parking, but be sure to feed the meter. There are several garages with a 5-block radius if you’re looking for a “set it and forget it” strategy.

Guest access
- Full Kitchen with an electric stove, microwave, coffee maker, smooth blender, dishwasher, refrigerator, and full tableware kits.

- Shared Laundry area for $3.75 for a full wash and d
neighborhood_description:
Hoboken is a charming and quaint escape from the hustle of NYC. It has steady foot traffic and greenery, making for a warm aesthetic. You are few blocks away from the PATH train, Ferries, and main strip (Washington St.). There are waterfront parks ~7 minute walk from apartment with impressive views of NYC.

For whatever reason, Hoboken is known for their “BYOB” policies. I love grabbing a nice bottle of wine and getting reasonably priced Italian dinners. There are a lot of bars and Taverns on the block, which sets the table for an active nightlife.

neighborhood_description: Designer boutiques, fancy chain stores and high-end art galleries make trendy SoHo a top shopping destination, especially for out-of-towners. During the day, street vendors sell everything from jewelry to original artwork.

description:
Recently renovated, beautifully furnished garden level apartment in downtown Jersey City. Enjoy the peace, quiet and safety of the apartment’s residential street or explore the restaurants and shops of Newark Ave just a block away. Also a 10-minute walk from the PATH which takes you to downtown Manhattan (World Trade Center) in 7 minutes and to midtown Manhattan (33rd St and 6th Ave) in 19 minutes. 20 minute drive to Newark Liberty International Airport

The space
Welcome to your retreat from a day out in the city! We have lived in Jersey City for over 10 years and are excited you will be spending some time exploring the area. We love to travel and know what makes for a great stay; we strive to provide the same to you.

The apartment is on two levels. You enter on the first level into the cozy living room. The sofa is comfortable and pulls out into a queen-size bed outfitted with a premium high-density foam mattress for a great night’s sleep. There is an
neighborhood_description:
Downtown Jersey City is an excellent place to explore in its own right. Within a 15 minute walk you will find more than 30 excellent restaurants including Razza (the best Pizza in NYC, according to the NY Times), Taqueria Downtown (best tacos in NJ, according to us!) and cuisines from all over the world. We also have a thriving art scene with lots of street art; ask Kevin for tips =)
It's only a 20 min walk to the waterfront at Exchange Place where you will have jaw dropping views of Manhattan across the river; there are a few excellent dining options there as well such as Hudson & Co, Lokal JC and DomoDomo.
